ActCustoms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the ACCOUNTING FOR IMPORTED GOODS AND PAYMENT OF DUTIES REGULATIONS by making improvements to the Customs Self-Assessment (CAS) Program, the CANPASS Program and the NEXUS Program that will enhance the risk-management approach to the movement of low-risk goods across the border.
